title: Notification Center added (v0.3.3)
message: Here you'll find news about the game.

title: Cooldown percentage display (v0.3.4)
message: Cooldown reduction now shows the correct percentage value on upgrade buttons.

title: Persistent Leaderboard Checkpoints (v0.3.5)
message: Checkpoints now persist across reloads, preventing unintentional double shows. Multiple reached checkpoints display sequentially.

title: Rebalancing & Next Share Cost Display (v0.3.6)
message: Floating Clicker Upgrades become more expensive more quickly. Prestige Modal shows the price of the next share.

title: AutoBuyer Buffer Badge (v0.3.7)
message: The AutoBuyer button now displays a yellow badge when a Money Buffer is set, making it easy to see at a glance if a buffer is active. The badge remains green when the AutoBuyer is simply enabled.

title: Unified In-App Notifications (v0.4.1)
message: All in-app notifications are now delivered centrally and consistently, providing a unified experience for all messages and alerts.

title: AutoBuyer Quick Toggle (v0.4.2)
message: The AutoBuyer button now supports double-press to quickly toggle all unlocked AutoBuyers at once, eliminating the need to open the modal for bulk enable/disable actions.

title: Critical Clicks in Money/s (v0.4.3)
message: Critical Clicks are now correctly included in the manual money per second calculation, making the stats more accurate.

title: Settings Refactoring & Small Prestige Rebalancing (v0.4.4)
message: All settings buttons were converted into switches for a more modern experience, and prestige values received minor balancing adjustments.
